title: Marvel Digital Holiday Special (2008) #2
description:
MARVEL DIGITAL COMICS EXCLUSIVE
HOLIDAY HEAT
The Marvel Divas spend a day in the city to do some shopping, but when a holiday accident puts nearby civilians in danger the super heroines must take a break from their leisure time to save the day!

MERRY FREAKIN' CHRISTMAS!!: Deadpool lands a job that requires him to infiltrate Santa’s workshop and change a name from naughty to nice. Caught “red-handed,” Deadpool finds himself toe to toe with Santa himself. But what happens when Santa makes an offer Deadpool can’t refuse? The answer involves bullets. Lots of bullets.

ROCK OF AGES: ‘Tis the season to celebrate with Marvel Digital Comics Unlimited as the 2009 MARVEL DIGITAL HOLIDAY SPECIAL kicks off in style! None other than legendary Marvel founding father Stan “The Man” Lee makes his MDCU debut, penning a special Fantastic Four tale with art by Nick Dragotta that could only be called MARVEL DIGITAL HOLIDAY SPECIAL: ROCK OF AGES. The Thing teaches the rest of Marvel’s First Family all about Chanukah, and in turn, they impart some lessons of their own on some would-be street toughs. All this plus an art cameo by Lee’s FF co-creator Jack Kirby in a one-of-a-kind story that should not be missed!

The celebration rolls on next week December 23 as we spread cheer with the X-Men in X-MAS, and finally the Marvel Divas turn up the HOLIDAY HEAT on December 29.
